profile.name: Muhammad Muzamil Hussain
profile.aboutMe: As a recent graduate software engineer, I bring a diverse skill set and a passion for DevOps. With significant understanding of DevOps and Cloud Computing Concepts, I offer a comprehensive understanding of industry-standard practices and the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC). My proficiency extends to my diverse experience such as working with full stack web applications.

experience.description: Engaged in DevOps principles and best practices, including automation, continuous integration, and continuous delivery, through hands-on learning and practical assignments. Assisted in streamlining development and deployment workflows, enhancing my understanding of the software development lifecycle and the importance of collaboration between development and operations teams.

As a Full Stack Intern, I had the opportunity to work on frontend development, creating Image-Highlights and Call-to-Action sections in VueJS for Swell.is ecommerce storefronts, as well as React JS components and libraries. Implemented Docker-related DevOps practices to streamline development workflows and improve deployment efficiency. Integrated CI/CD pipelines to enhance code integration and testing processes. Created wireframes for mobile apps on Invision Freehand and dashboard design on Figma. Managed user stories, functional requirements, and related tasks for incoming projects.
